
\beginhymn Laudemus Virginem.


\sidx{Let us praise the Virgin}

\moveright10mm\vtop{

\hsize80mm

\resetlayout

\def\Notes{\vnotes4}
\def\NOtes{\vnotes5}
\def\NOTes{\vnotes6}

%\rmlyrics

\def\lyr1#1{\cchar{-6}{\rm #1}}
\def\engl#1{\cchar{-12}{\it #1}}
%\def\lyr3#1{\cchar{-15}{#1}}
%\def\lyr4#1{\cchar{-19}{#1}}

\generalmeter\meterC
%\belowsystem{6}
\smallmusicsize
\setclef1{\treble}
\startpiece
%\Notes\lyr1{1.}\en
\Notes\lyr1{Lau-}\rchar{10}{I}\qa{f}\en
\Notes\lyr1{de-}\engl{}\qa{e}\en
\NOtes\lyr1{mus}\ha{d}\en
\bar

\bar

\bar
